channel.title: CVE Feed for Mattermost -- Mattermost Boards
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mattermost -- Mattermost Boards

item.title: CVE-2021-37867|2024-08-04T01:30:08.561Z -- mattermost -- mattermost%20boards
item.description: Mattermost Boards plugin v0.10.0 and earlier fails to protect email addresses of all users via one of the Boards APIs, which allows authenticated and unauthorized users to access this information resulting in sensitive & private information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2021-37866|2024-08-04T01:30:08.497Z -- mattermost -- mattermost%20boards
item.description: Mattermost Boards plugin v0.10.0 and earlier fails to invalidate a session on the server-side when a user logged out of Boards, which allows an attacker to reuse old session token for authorization.
